00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003 Name:         MDQ_FADCBufferOverflow
00004 Created by:   Andrew Edmonds + Joe Grange
00005 
00006 Contents:     hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Total
00007               - plots the total number of MIDAS events in which 
00008                 the FADC buffer overflowed for each board
00009 
00010               hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Fraction
00011               - plots the fraction of MIDAS events where
00012                 the FADC buffer overflowed for each board
00013 
00014               hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_TotalByEvent
00015               - plots the total number of FADC buffer overflows
00016                 in each board on an event-by-event basis
00017 
00018 \********************************************************************/
00019

00078 INT MDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_init()
00079 {
00080   // See if the DataQuality_LowLevel/ directory already exists
00081   if (!gDirectory->Cd("DataQuality_LowLevel")) {
00082     
00083     std::string dir_name("DataQuality_LowLevel/");
00084     gDirectory->mkdir(dir_name.c_str());
00085     gDirectory->Cd(dir_name.c_str());
00086   }
00087 
00088   // Get run number
00089   char key_name[80];
00090   int size,run_number;
00091   sprintf(key_name, "Runinfo/Run number");
00092   size=sizeof(int);
00093   db_get_value(hDB,0,key_name, &run_number, &size, TID_INT,1);
00094 
00095   // Create the histograms
00096   hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Total = new TH1F(
00097     "hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Total",
00098     Form("Total number of MIDAS Events with buffer overflows per board, run %d",run_number),
00099     4,128, 132);
00100   hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Total->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00101   hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Total->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("FADC Board Number");
00102   hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Total->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of events with buffer overflows");
00103 
00104   hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Fraction = new TH1F(
00105     "hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Fraction",
00106     Form("Fraction of MIDAS Events with FADC buffer overflows by board, run %d",run_number),
00107     4,128, 132);
00108   hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Fraction->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00109   hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Fraction->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("FADC Board Number");
00110   hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Fraction->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Fraction of events with buffer overflows");
00111 
00112   hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_TotalByEvent = new TH2F(
00113     "hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_TotalByEvent",
00114     Form("FADC buffer overflows by board and event, run %d",run_number),
00115     4,128, 132,5000,0,5000);
00116   hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_TotalByEvent->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00117   hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_TotalByEvent->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("FADC Board Number");
00118   hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_TotalByEvent->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("MIDAS event");
00119 
00120   gDirectory->Cd("/MidasHists/");
00121 
00122   return SUCCESS;
00123 }

00128 INT MDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_BOR(INT run_number)
00129 {
00130   n_total_midas_events = 1;
00131   
00132   return SUCCESS;
00133 }
00134 
00138 INT MDQ_FADCBufferOverflow(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00139 {
00140   // Get the event number
00141   int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00142 
00143   // Get the NBUF bank and get a pointer to the raw data
00144   unsigned int* raw; // points at the raw data
00145   int bankSize = bk_locate(pevent,"NBUF",&raw);
00146 
00147   int board_number = 0;
00148   int n_buffers_overflow = 0;
00149 
00150   bool Boards[256]; // We can have maximally 256 FADC boards due to the address space
00151   for(int i=0; i<256; ++i) Boards[i] = false;
00152 
00153   for (int i = 0; i < bankSize; i++) {
00154     board_number = *(raw+i);
00155 
00156     if(*(raw+i) >= 0 && *(raw+i) < 255) Boards[i] = true;
00157 
00158     n_buffers_overflow++;
00159     //printf("Event #%d: Board %d n buffers overflowed %d\n", midas_event_number, board_number,n_buffers_overflow);
00160 
00161     // Fill Diagnostic histogram
00162     hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Total->Fill(board_number, 1);   
00163     hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Fraction->Fill(board_number, 1);
00164     hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_TotalByEvent->Fill(board_number,midas_event_number, 1);
00165 
00166   }
00167 
00168   /*
00169   for(int i=0; i<256; ++i){
00170     if(Boards[i] == true){
00171       hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Fraction->Scale(1.0 / n_total_midas_events);
00172     }
00173   }
00174   */  
00175 
00176   ++n_total_midas_events;
00177 
00178   return SUCCESS;
00179 }
00180 
00181 INT MDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_EOR(INT run_number)
00182 {
00183 
00184   //for(int i=0; i<256; ++i){
00185     //if(Boards[i] == true){
00186       hDQ_FADCBufferOverflow_Fraction->Scale(1.0 / n_total_midas_events);
00187     //}
00188   //}
00189 
00190   return SUCCESS;
00191 }
